DisplayString.Name: Allow the Project connector to automatically set a status for each Project imported into the Service Manager database.
Allow the connector to set a 'New' status on Projects imported from Project Server that are 0% complete.
Allow the connector to set an 'In Progress' status on Projects that are between 1-99% complete.
Allow the connector to set a 'Completed' status on Projects that are 100% complete.
Specify how long a Project will remain in the Service Manager database before it is automatically groomed. This grooming workflow is based on the last modified date of the Project.
Enter a name and description for the Project connector

You can enable the import of first-level Project Tasks as Task Activities in Release Records to enable more control of your release cycle. When a Release Record has a related Project, or if the Release Record is assigned to a Change Request with a related Project, the related Project Tasks will be added to the Release Record. You may also specify tags to detect in the title of the Project Tasks for insertion into the Release Record.
Add first level Project Tasks into Release Records.
Add first-level Project Tasks containing following tag:
*Leaving this blank will insert all first-level Tasks from the Project.
Add Task Activities at the following activity stage:
*Tasks are added as Task Activities before the first activity makred with the selected stage.
*Task information is updated or added from Project Server at the interval specified. It is not recommended to set the interval less than 5 minutes.
Select the connector to use to pull Task information from Project Server:
Process Change Requests instead of Release Reocrds for related Projects.

*When selected, the workflow checks for a related Project in any active Change Requests instead of the Release Record. It will add Task Activities into the Release Record tied to a Change Request through a Dependent Activity.
Assign the first resource as an Activity Implementer
*Assigns the first resource assigned to the task from Project Server as the Activity Implementer in the Task Activity.
Enter in your Cireson Project Connector license key to license the connector. Workflows and Forms will not run without a valid license key.
(Cireson) Project Task Activity Relates To Project
Work Item Relates To Project
DisplayString.Description: Work Item relates to a Project Configuration Item.
